DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effectiveness of Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) block as a part of a multimodal postoperative pain management after robot-assisted laparoscopic hysterecomy.
DOC.brief_title: Transversus Abdominis Plane Block After Robot-assisted Laparocopic Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Age 1880 BMI 1740 Written consent Can cooperate Drug and alcohol abuse Consumption of opioids Drug allergy Infection at insertion point of needle
